entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Blainville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 8.8°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
